alert.note: Alert for Furnas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:21PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN FURNAS COUNTY THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 820 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilsonville, or 22 miles northwest of Norton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wilsonville around 825 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
